flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=110>>110 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 110-30 = <<110-30=80>>80 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*80 = <<40=40>>40 seashells
He was left with 80-40= <<80-40=40>>40 seashells
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 110. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
